column2: BRIEF-Southwest Gas Holdings Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.63 May 7 (Reuters) - Southwest Gas Holdings Inc: * SOUTHWEST GAS HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.60 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY CONSOLIDATED OPERATING REVENUE $754.3 MILLION VERSUS $654.7 MILLION * ON COMPARATIVE BASIS, NATURAL GAS SEGMENT 2018 OPERATING INCOME EXPECTED TO BE RELATIVELY FLAT OR MODESTLY HIGHER BETWEEN YRS * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR NATURAL GAS SEGMENT ESTIMATED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $670 MILLION IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Southwest Gas Holdings Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.63 May 7 (Reuters) - Southwest Gas Holdings Inc: * SOUTHWEST GAS HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.60 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY CONSOLIDATED OPERATING REVENUE $754.3 MILLION VERSUS $654.7 MILLION * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN 2018 ARE ESTIMATED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $670 MILLION * ON A COMPARATIVE BASIS, 2018 OPERATING INCOME IS EXPECTED TO BE RELATIVELY FLAT OR MODESTLY HIGHER BETWEEN YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
